page.title: 12ROGER MUSSELL OF WOODINGDEAN
page.content: Roger Mussell is the local pet shop owner,having lived in woodingdean for 35 years.His favourite animals are foxes which can be found,along with badgers and wild birds,in the local valleys.He has thirty to forty animals at home.When he first started to work with animals he was seventeen and has owned the local pet shop for nineteen years.He chose Woodingdean because it was where he lived.In his spare time he likes watching badgers or going to "good" pop concerts.He never goes to visit zoos.Wednesdays he spends at Rudyard Kipling School taking a club.He feels snares are a poor way of killing wild animals. A lot of his time is spent looking after wild animals that local people find and bring along to him.
